Class.ClassComment: KeyValueFilterConverter /** * This interface is an optimization that can be used when a filter and converter are most efficiently used as the same object composing the filtering and conversion in the same method invocation. * @author wburns * @since 7.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Will both filter the entry and if passed subsequently convert the value to a new value. A returned value of null will symbolize the value not passing the filter, so ensure your conversion will not return null if you want this entry to be returned. * @param key The key of the entry to filter * @param value The value of the entry to filter and then convert * @param metadata The metadata attached to the entry * @return The converted value or null if the filter didn't pass */
